name: Decisive Campaigns: Case Blue
description: Decisive Campaigns: Case Blue simulates the German drive to Stalingrad and into the Caucasus of the summer of 1942, as well as its May preludes (2nd Kharkov offensive, Operation Trappenjagd) and also the Soviet winter counter-offensive (Operation Uranus) that ended with the encirclement of 6th Army in Stalingrad.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP2), Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.5 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 8MB video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible 9 Sound Card

reviews.review_text: I play all the VR Design games. Adv Tactics is good, DC Warsaw is better, DC CB is best. Can't wait for DC3 Barbarossa.
